title: Heartbeat (1946, Drama) Directed by Sam Wood | with Ginger Rogers | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Heartbeat (1946, Drama) Directed by Sam Wood | with Ginger Rogers | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
A young female escapee from a reform school joins a pickpocket academy in Paris. She is caught red-handed on her first attempt at stealing by an upper class man. He recruits her to do him a favor at a society party where she meets and falls in love with a young, handsome, rich diplomat. Whether or not she can land him is another story.

Black and white version: https://youtu.be/YgLYpBcbZc8


Original title: Heartbeat (1946)
This film is available with English & Spanish audio, and also subtitled in many languages.

Director: Sam Wood
Writers: Morrie Ryskind, Hans Wilhelm 
Stars: Ginger Rogers, Jean-Pierre Aumont, Adolphe Menjou & Basil Rathbone
Genres: Colorized, Classics, Drama, Comedy, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with dubbed audio and subtitles)
02:25 A drama unfolds in a classroom as a professor teaches pickpocketing skills and tests students' abilities.
11:33 A young woman seeks guidance on avoiding trouble and considers a white marriage for safety.
19:50 A courtroom drama unfolds as a thief faces consequences for stealing, leading to a secret mission at a ball.
29:45 A series of events unfold at an embassy ball involving a stolen watch and favors asked.
40:02 A young woman attends her first ball, receives praise for her work, and shares a special moment with a gentleman.
50:27 A series of events unfold involving theft, deceit, and a reform school escapee at a school and an embassy ball.
1:02:32 A man offers a solution to a friend's financial troubles through marriage to a charming girl.
1:04:57 A man proposes a marriage of convenience to a woman, buying her clothes and expressing loneliness.
1:14:26 Marriage dilemma unfolds as loyalty is tested and love is questioned.
1:24:48 A woman rejects a marriage proposal, causing a stir at a courthouse wedding and leading to a romantic dilemma.
1:37:59 Complicated relationships unfold at a ball, leading to a proposal and emotional revelation.
